actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Forests and Public Lands.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Subcommittee on Forests and Public Lands. Hearings held.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Forests and Public Land Management

official_title: A bill for the relief of Matt Clawson.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named individual in full settlement of claims against the United States for losses resulting from reliance on the approval of the Forest Service of his claim for a specified placer mine in the vicinity of Salmon River in Idaho.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Matt Clawson.
